description: A clever accomplice, trained to relieve the enemy of both their weapons and their loot caches.
name: Chesa Kubrow

patchlogs.name: Call of the Tempestarii: Update 30
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a harmless script error that could be caused when a Chesa Kubrow attempts to Neutralize an enemy.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Railjack Revisited (Part 1): Update 27.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error that could occur when leaving an open world area with a Chesa Kubrow using the Retrieve Precept.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.changes:
The Chesa Kubrow Retrieve Precept has been changed to reflect the following mechanic:
Chesa Kubrow now attempts to retrieve the single closest loot, the same way Nekros’ Desecrate does.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.5.0 + 22.5.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Improvements towards the Chesa Kubrow Retrieve functionality when retrieving items in nearby crates and when in the Plains.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Optimized Feral and Chesa Kubrow AI to reduce time spent looking for pickups.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Improved the interaction between the Chesa Kubrow’s Scavenge and Retrieve Abilities, reducing the amount of downtime between the Kubrow smashing crates and picking up items.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes:
The Chesa Kubrow will now be more responsive when picking up multiple items in close proximity.
Fixed Chesa Kubrow getting stuck when trying to pick up unreachable items.
Fixed Chesa Kubrow becoming stuck when trying to attack a crate it can’t reach.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.changes: Chesa Kubrow now instantly pick up dropped non-Mod items instead of bringing them back to the player.  Mods will be carried back to the player as normal.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.additions: Due to an error in Kubrow egg type generation many players hunting for Chesa Kubrow have been unable to obtain the breed since the release of Chesa without purchasing the egg from the Market.  While the error has been fixed we understand the frustration this has caused Kubrow enthusiasts, and will be releasing an alert that offers 2 Chesa Kubrow Genetic Code Templates as a reward.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error preventing the Chesa Kubrow from being a potential egg type on drop tables.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Chesa Kubrow`s name and description not displaying on the Imprint display screen.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.changes: The Chesa Kubrow’s Retrieve ability will now grab multiple items at once.

description: An experimental blending of Kubrow and Infestation. Uses maggots and other Infested abilities to inflict damage and control the battlefield.
name: Helminth Charger

patchlogs.name: Update 30.7: Nidus Prime & Plague Star
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where the pedestal for the cyst of a regressed Helminth Charger would retract into the floor when opening and closing the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Gara Prime: Update 30.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helminth Charger Emblems clipping into shoulders.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Railjack Revisited (Part 1): Update 27.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed script error related to Helminth Chargers Strain Eruption Maggots exploding.

patchlogs.name: Wukong Deluxe: Update 25.5.0 + 25.5.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the Emblem offset on the Helminth Charger, Drahk Pattern, and Underbrush Pattern Kubrows to fix them disappearing completely.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.0.2 + 25.0.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the emissive colors on the Helminth Charger Metus Skin appearing all blue.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Helminth Charger standing in place and swiping at the air instead of damaging enemies, also fixes lunge attacks missing even though they should be hitting when the Strain Mod Set is equipped.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.2
patchlogs.changes: The Hastened Deflection Mod is now a ‘BEAST’ Mod, meaning it’s also compatible with Kavats and Helminth Charger.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed inability to equip Bite, Pack Leader, and Medi-Pet Kit on the Helminth Charger.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.4.0
patchlogs.changes:
Made some micro-optimizations to the Helminth Charger Proboscis Precept.
Made some micro-optimizations to the Helminth Charger Trample and Huras Hunt Precepts.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Little Helper Hat not sitting correctly when equipped on the Helminth Charger Metus Kubrow Skin.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.1.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Adorn any Kubrow or Helminth Charger Pet with a battery of gothic spikes.
Everything you need to become the ultimate terror. Includes the unholy Nidus Phryke Skin, Deimos Claw Skin, Nosos Syandana, Helminth Charger Metus Skin and Metus Kubrow Armor.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.15.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Kubrow Armor not appearing on Helminth Chargers with Drahk Skin equipped.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed custom energy color on the Helminth Charger not being very noticeable.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.6
patchlogs.changes:
All Helminth Chargers bred before Update 20 had the same default color scheme (pink/orange) that was originally only meant as their eye color. As a result, Chargers bred before Update 20, who currently do not have custom colors, have had their default colors rerolled to something new!
Added Energy color option for the Helminth Charger customizations in Arsenal.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Little Helper Hat attachment awkwardly positioned inside of the Helminth Charger’s head and neck.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed crash when changing Armor for the Helminth Charger.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Helminth Charger Codex diorama freezing the game.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: oh wait, that’s the newly reskinned Helminth Charger! With a whole new look comes a new attitude.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.6.0 + 19.6.0.1
patchlogs.additions: As stated and shown on Devstream #85, the Helminth Cure is here. By now, a majority of Tenno have been faced with a persistent and protruding infection on numerous Warframes. For those with a fully 7-day matured Helminth Cyst, the individual permanent cure awaits you in the Helminth Infirmary. The completion of Glast Gambit is not required to have your Helminth Cyst removed, and once the cure has been administered that Warframe will not be granted access back into the room and can no longer be infected. Keep in mind that breeding a Helminth Charger requires a mature Helminth Cyst to be drained

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect Helminth Charger Codex entry.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient

description: A reliable partner that locates supplies for their Tenno master and while thinning enemy ranks.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Made some micro-optimizations to the Sahasa Kubrow Dig Precept.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes: Sahasa Kubrows can no longer dig up Resources in Onslaught.

description: Fast and foxy, Vulpaphyla are agile allies to bring along on your next adventure.
name: Sly Vulpaphyla

patchlogs.name: Gara Prime: Update 30.3.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Sly Vulpaphyla not being affected by Ivara’s Prowl invisibility while downed and after being revived. 
Fixed the Tek Enhance mod not increasing the Duration of the Sly Vulpaphyla’s Survival Instinct Precept.

patchlogs.name: Heart of Deimos: Hotfix 29.0.8 + 29.0.8.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed many cases where the Sly Vulpaphyla wouldn't respect cooldowns, would fail to trigger, or would result in Client FX not getting cleaned up. 
Potential fix towards a script error caused by Sly Vulpaphyla Survival Instinct triggering.

patchlogs.name: Heart of Deimos: Hotfix 29.0.7
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Sly Vulpaphyla’s Survival Instinct FX causing a performance dip due to its visual distortion. As reported here!

patchlogs.name: Heart of Deimos: Hotfix 29.0.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Sly Vulpaphyla's Survival Instinct not showing FX for Clients.

patchlogs.name: Heart of Deimos: Hotfix 29.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when a Sly Vulpaphyla deactivates a Precept.

description: This sly feline is playful yet devious.
name: Smeeta Kavat

patchlogs.name: Veilbreaker: Hotfix 32.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error that could occur with the Smeeta Kavat’s Mischief after traversing a Sanctuary Onslaught portal.

patchlogs.name: Heart of Deimos: Hotfix 29.0.8 + 29.0.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Smeeta Kavat's Mischief ability, Carnis Mod Set bonus, and Survival Instinct modifying evasion incorrectly, and instead acting as a debuff as opposed to the proper buff.

patchlogs.name: Scarlet Spear: 27.3.15 + 27.3.15.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error with Smeeta Kavat’s Mischief precept.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Hotfix 24.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash related to having Charm equipped on your Smeeta Kavat.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Smeeta Kavats being unreachable when becoming downed in mid-air.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Mesa Prime - Hotfix 24.2.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash that occurred when switching to your Arch-Gun with a Smeeta Kavat active.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed inability to catch fish with the Pulse Spear when affected by Smeeta Kavat’s Crit buff.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Smeeta Kavat’s Charm Critical Chance and Energy recharge Buffs no longer apply to Operators.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.1.0 + 21.1.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Improved the Smeeta Kavat Mischief buff for Operators. Relevant buffs on the Warframes will always be transferred to the Operator and vice versa.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.9
patchlogs.changes: Operators are now affected by the Smeeta Kavat Mischief/Charm buffs.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes: Lowered the specular lightning on the Smeeta Kavat to address ‘plastic’ looking issues.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Missing Smeeta Kavat icon and wrong Adarza icon

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes:
Allows Smeeta Kavat to become invisible while a decoy Kavat draws fire by running toward the enemy.
Smeeta Kavat bestows its owner with good fortune during the course of a mission.

description: Bred by the Orokin for combat. This martial beast lives to create chaos and bring down the most fierce opponents.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some awkward wording in a string about the Sunika Kubrow.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.5

Fixed an issue with Sunika Kubrows not coming with their proper Mods when purchased.
PSA: A script is in progress to give mods to those account affected by the Sunika Kubrows not coming with the proper mods.

patchlogs.name: Operation: Scarlet Spear: TennoGen 27.3.8 + 27.3.8.1 + 27.3.8.2
patchlogs.fixes: We made a hasty change in Hotfix 27.3.6 that removed Venari’s Heal aura from affecting Oplinks AND Defense Targets. Firstly, the terminology of calling Venari’s Defense Target healing a ‘fix’ was incorrect, so apologies there on my behalf. It’s correct to say it was a feature for Venari, considering it had its own Tip for it! The change stemmed from our desire to resolve Operation exploits as quickly as possible, and we didn't communicate this properly.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.changes:
Changed Khora’s Venari animations from domestic Kavat to Feral Kavat. 
Tweaked Venari command sounds.
Fixed Khora’s Venari getting locked in her Attack Mode when attempting Mastery Rank tests, which can cause failure on stealth tests (MR9 for example). 
Fixed Venari freezing in place when entering Cetus from the Plains, and subsequently duplicating if you head back out, eventually leading to a hall of kitty statues.
Reduced the damage of Khora's Venari in Conclave.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed being able to pet an invisible Venari if interacting with her immediately after exiting her upgrade screen in the Arsenal. 
Fixed a script error with Khora’s Venari.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes:
Operators can no longer be targeted for Venari to Heal. This follows precedent with other Warframe abilities not being castable on Operators. 
Fixed Venari’s ability stats and passive speed buff UI appearing to be affected by Efficiency Mods. Ability Strength Mods are what applies to Venari’s abilities/passive. 
Fixed Venari’s Heal being permanently active when equipping negative Duration Mods on Khora.
Fixed not being able to see Venari’s hold indicator when switching postures. 
Fixed incorrect icon displaying for Venari’s Healing posture.
Fixed Venari script error that would occur if you're controlling the Operator when Venari respawns.
Fixed Venari not disappearing when playing an Archwing mission as Khora.
Fixed a case of Khora getting the Venari speed buff HUD icon when Venari fails to spawn.
Fixed Venari attacking you in the Simulacrum Arsenal when Friendly Fire is enabled.
Reduced the damage of Khora's Venari in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.8
patchlogs.changes:
Venari fights independently until she receives a command. Khora’s third ability (Venari) overrides Venari’s target, as indicated by the icon over Khora’s head.
Commanding Venari while in the Heal posture without a valid target will command Venari to heal Khora.
Companion mods like Animal Instinct have been fixed so they will work properly on Venari.
Venari deals Slash damage to enemies instead of Impact damage.
Ability Strength Mods on Khora now affect Venari abilities.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.7
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Venari UI stats overlapping text when Dual Wielding.
Fixed Venari's loadout slot appearing in the Conclave Arsenal even if Khora is not equipped. Interacting with Venari’s loadout slot would result in a crash.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.18.0
patchlogs.changes: It’s the postponed Christmas gift that keeps on giving! Revealed back on November 3rd 2017, Khora has finally clawed her way to your screens. From an originally proposed damage deviator to the now metallic Kavat wielding queen of the Strangledome, her time is now. But, she won’t come easily. For Khora and Venari have been detected in Simaris’ Sanctuary, and it’s his rules that are law there.

components.name: Benign Infested Tumor
components.description: The Infestation infects all fish on Deimos, even those that do not show any external mutations.Source: Cut from all Cambion Drift fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos).

components.name: Fass Residue
components.description: A chunk of the wyrm Fass, collected after his explosive death in the Cambion Drift. Used to attract Glutinox on the surface during Vome, Ostimyr at surface hotspots during Fass, and Vitreospina in caves during Fass/Vome.Location: Cambion Drift on Deimos while Vome is active

components.name: Ganglion
components.description: A fallen clump of entangled nerve fibers, redundant organs, and thin sensory membranes.Location: Cambion Drift on Deimos

components.name: Pustulent Cognitive Nodule
components.description: The Infestation provokes the growth of multiple, seemingly redundant brain-like clusters, whose function may be linked to hivemind activity. Source: Cut from Aquapulmo and Cryptosuctus fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Aquapulmo in Cambion Drift surface hotspots during Vome, and Cryptosuctus on the Cambion Drift surface during Fass. Also drops from Requiem Obelisks and Rolizor Infested Cysts in the Cambion Drift.

description: These hard-charging, four-legged predators make formidable companions when in the field.
name: Vizier Predasite

patchlogs.name: Heart of Deimos: Hotfix 29.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed script error when Vizier Predasite dies when attempting to heal.

components.name: Circuits
components.description: Various electronic components.Location: Venus, Ceres, and the Kuva Fortress

components.name: Nitain Extract
components.description: Each vial is produced by the painstaking expression of billions of rare, ocean-vent dwelling microorganisms.Location: Nightwave Cred Offerings

components.name: Salvage
components.description: High value metals collected from war salvage.Location: Mars, Jupiter, and Sedna

components.name: Thaumic Distillate
components.description: Thaumica reduced to its most durable, workable elements.Blueprint sold by Otak in the Necralisk on Deimos.

components.name: Pustulite
components.description: Half-formed, incomplete spore bearers, little more than twitching flesh with claws to latch on with.Location: Cambion Drift on Deimos

components.name: Spinal Core Section
components.description: Many delicate and complex nerve fibers are housed in the jointed vertebrae, which are one of the creature's most resilient parts. Found from Vitreospina fish known to eke out a primitive existence in cave systems.Source: Cut from Vitreospina and Chondricord fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos). Catch Vitreospina in Cambion Drift caves during Fass and Vome, and Chondricord in Cambion Drift cave hotspots during Fass and Vome. Also drops from Isolation Vault Bounties and Sagiant Entrati Caskets in the Cambion Drift.

components.name: Tubercular Gill System
components.description: Adaptive membranes allow many Deimos fish to move freely between fluid and gaseous environments.Source: Cut from the following Cambion Drift fish via Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos):OstimyrAquapulmoVitreospinaMyxostomataDuroid

components.name: Vome Residue
components.description: A gobbet of raw flesh, fallen from the wyrm Vome in her death spasm. Used to attract Chondricord and Duriod in Cambion Drift cave hotspots during Fass and Vome.Location: Cambion Drift on Deimos while Fass is active

components.name: Axidrol Alloy
components.description: A compound formed from Axidite.Blueprint sold by Smokefinger in Fortuna on Venus.

components.name: Brickie Muon Battery
components.description: A small, atomic power source.Source: Dismantled from Brickie servofish via The Business in Fortuna (Venus). Catch Brickie in Orb Vallis ponds and rivers during Warm weather. Also drops from resource containers across the Orb Vallis.

components.name: Travocyte Alloy
components.description: A compound formed from Travoride.Blueprint sold by Smokefinger in Fortuna on Venus.

components.name: Vega Toroid
components.description: A device of undetermined function and origin. Prized by Vox Solaris and the Quills.Earn Vega Toroids from enemies located at the Spaceport in the Orb Vallis and from Mite Raknoids. They can also be found as pick-ups in caves located around the Orb Vallis (Venus).
